issues.description: The solution implements getTotalNumberOfStudents with a boolean parameter (`includeGuests`), but the problem specification and UML diagram define getTotalNumberOfStudents() without any parameters. This mismatch could confuse students about the intended method signature and return behavior.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the solutionâ€™s getTotalNumberOfStudents method to have no parameters (i.e., public int getTotalNumberOfStudents()) and internally return the sum of inscribed and guest students.
